Articles.Content: i recently made a install of rss 1.2.2 it had some bugs but i fixed them all but now my game crashes everytime i eva i tried asking a really good person who knows how to fix these things he didn't know however i suspect it's something to do with texture replacer replaced i need help with this stuff and it needs to be done by the 12 of october because i'm going on vacation and id like to have kerbal with me no bugs and so its ready to play

On 10/4/2017 at 7:45 PM, Jim123 said:

i recently made a install of rss 1.2.2 it had some bugs but i fixed them all but now my game crashes everytime i eva i tried asking a really good person who knows how to fix these things he didn't know however i suspect it's something to do with texture replacer replaced i need help with this stuff and it needs to be done by the 12 of october because i'm going on vacation and id like to have kerbal with me no bugs and so its ready to play

 

Jim123: You may find that you're more likely to get help if you provide information on your install and be as detailed as possible. Check this link on how to get support for Modded installs. Good luck and "fly safe!"
